name: Puppet Improv Theatre
description:
Do you like improv shows and puppet theatres? Then this is for you!

Get two Xbox controllers and play out a scene with a friend!

Toggle between moving the body, eyes and arms using D-pad, then use the left and right joysticks for movement. 

Control the eyelids with the triggers (say, if you wanna flirt a bit with that other babe on the stage) and freeze poses using the bumpers.

Use the A, B, X, Y buttons to switch between mouth poses while you do your voice acting!
